p: Furthermore, enediynyl peptides were synthesized based on the amino acid sequence of cleavage sites of known substrate sequences like the LASV glycoprotein and the prodomain of SKI-1/S1P (Basak et al. 2015). The most potent compound ( 54, Fig. 11.20) inhibits SKI-1/S1P with a K i value of 0.82 μM.
